meanings.sent1: The maverick in our class always comes up with unique ideas.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a maverick for always challenging traditional beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The maverick decided to wear a cape to school for fun.
meanings.sent4: Like a lone maverick in the desert, he stood out from the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The maverick artist painted with colors no one had ever seen before.

meanings.definition: A person who refuses to conform to a particular group or party.
meanings.sent1: The political maverick always voted independently.
meanings.sent2: He was labeled a maverick for not joining any political party.
meanings.sent3: The maverick brought a watermelon to the pizza party just to be different.
meanings.sent4: She stood out in the sea of suits like a rebellious maverick.
meanings.sent5: The maverick's refusal to conform made a lasting impression on everyone.
